jobTitle: ArcGIS Data Scientist Product Engineer - Imagery
jobDescription: OverviewJoin our imagery team and work to design, implement, and test imagery machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence techniques in order to detect objects in imagery, label the objects, and classify pixels. This is an exciting opportunity to innovate traditional GIS and remote sensing workflows for extracting information from imagery. In addition, you will have the opportunity to contribute to writing great user documentation, conceptualize and build demonstrations, and collect user requirements which will help drive future releases. You will also have a chance to exercise and develop your software development experience with programming languages such as C++ and Python.
